The brand new FAO country showcase is a space where Member Countries can highlight their agricultural systems, innovations and food products. Take a worldwide tour of local agriculture, beatiful landscapes and typical crops and food. More countries will be available in the upcoming months.

Chile Link: http://www.fao.org/country-showcase/chl/

Egypt Link: http://www.fao.org/country-showcase/egy/

France Link: http://www.fao.org/country-showcase/fra/

Ghana Link: http://www.fao.org/country-showcase/gha/

Thailand Link: http://www.fao.org/country-showcase/tha/

Country Profiles

The FAO Country Profiles collects information from the entire FAO website and provides a fast and reliable way to access country-specific information with no need to search through individual databases and systems. It also includes a direct link to the Country website for in-depth information.
